meta.en:
This phunnel style hookah bowl (sometimes spelled funnel) is specially designed to get the best smoke quality from wetter and juicier shisha tobacco brands such as Tangiers, Starbuzz, Haze, Afzal and Alfakher.  Each bowl should hold approximately 10-15 grams of shisha tobacco and as an added bonus, it works nearly flawlessly with the Heat Management Devices (Kaloud Lotus & Baigo HMD)

Colour Available: Blue Over Rootbeer, Green Pistachio, White

description.en:

With the width all around of 28 cm and centre opening is 4 cm, for sure your hookah will look outstanding & show the true beauty of your hookah stem additionally!

With the width all around of 28 cm and centre opening is 4 cm, for sure your hookah will look outstanding & show the true beauty of your hookah stem additionally!

meta.en:
HMD a.k.a Heat Management Device is the next step towards the perfect hookah smoking session. The HMD is an innovative device and is used to regulate the transfer of heat from the hookah charcoal to your shisha flavour.
Advantages of using this HMD:
Significantly reduces the amount of ash, ultra-fine particles, and chemicals that pass through the shisha tobacco, providing a smoother, cleaner, and more flavorful hookah smoking experience.

Eliminates the need for hookah foil or aluminum bowl screens.

Extends the life of your hookah smoking session.

Requires very little charcoal rotation, allowing for a relaxing, hassle-free hookah smoke.

Wooden Handle for a nice full control.

description.en:
HMD a.k.a Heat Management Device is the next step towards the perfect hookah smoking session. The HMD is an innovative device and is used to regulate the transfer of heat from the hookah charcoal to your shisha flavour.

Requires very little charcoal rotation, allowing for a relaxing, hassle-free hookah smoke.

Wooden Handle for a nice full control.

meta.en:
Height: 32 cm
Diameter Opening: 4.6 cm
If you have ever broken a base then you know the pains of searching for that right one, whether it is an upgrade or a replacement it needs to be visually appealing.
The Mazaya Glass Bases carry the best quality and exquisite look , and now you can add these new styles onto your own hookah setup.
Before you take that leap, let's make sure that these bases fit your requirements!

description.en:
Height: 32 cm
Diameter Opening: 4.6 cm
If you have ever broken a base then you know the pains of searching for that right one, whether it is an upgrade or a replacement it needs to be visually appealing.
The Mazaya Glass Bases carry the best quality and exquisite look , and now you can add these new styles onto your own hookah setup.
Before you take that leap, let's make sure that these bases fit your requirements!

meta.en:
Height: 32 cm
Diameter opening: 4.6 cm

NOTE:
please make sure to properly measure the diameter of your base grommet to assure that it will fit!

These are replacement glass hookahs bases which will fit to Classic chamber Hookahs and also Egyptian Hookahs and most other hookahs of comparable size.
These high quality traditional "bell style" hookah bases that have decorative style and designs.
Find your ideal replacement hookah base to fit your hookah in Baigo Hookah.

The Hookah Base is one of the most essential parts in the way a hookah looks and is playing pivotal point to the way a hookah perform. Coming in a wide variety of glass, our hookah bases can be used as replacements or just an additional way to make your hookah look a lot more awesome.
Find your ideal replacement hookah base to fit your hookah in Baigo Hookah.

please make sure to properly measure the diameter of your base grommet to assure that it will fit!

The Hookah Base is one of the most essential parts in the way a hookah looks and is playing pivotal point to the way a hookah perform. Coming in a wide variety of glass, our hookah bases can be used as replacements or just an additional way to make your hookah look a lot more awesome.

meta.en:
These are super high quality, heavy duty glass bases for Khalil Maamoon Hookahs but will fit other hookahs of comparable size, like Shika Hookah, Farida Hookah or Any hookahs with classic chamber style.

Like many other Khalil Maamoon Hookah Bases, these measure 33 cm in height and the top opening measures 4.6 cm in diameter.

Elegant and beautiful, these bases will be sure to add a colorful charm to your KM or any other large hookah!

If you are ordering a KM base for a hookah that is not a Khalil Mamoon Hookah, please be sure to properly measure the diameter of your base grommet to assure that it will fit.

description.en:

meta.en:
This Flavor Retainer is an ingenious device that will not only allow you to have a shisha session longer with better flavor, it can also increase the cloud output of your hookah.  This low tech solution has extended hookah sessions and reduced harshness with results similar to the other Heat Hanagement Systems Device like Kaloud.

You hookah coals are now elevated from the top of the bowl, giving your shisha an extra 0.25 mm of distance from the concentrated heat of the glowing coals. This prevents the shisha from burning and the smoke getting harsh or losing the authenticity of your flavor.

Best fit paired with Baigo Phunnel Bowl

description.en:

meta.en:
Welcome to The Hybrid Edition Dhose 2.0!
It is one of the latest members to the Dhose family, and this new hose is GUARANTEED to make any hookah smoker happy & cheerful!
In the past we have seen the Dhose collection utilize aluminum (Aluminum Dhose), all of which contain a superb wide open draw.
This new model of hose has a unique handle that combines aluminum and silicon, creating one hybrid beast of a hose measuring at 197 cm long.

description.en:
Welcome to The Hybrid Edition Dhose 2.0!

In the past we have seen the Dhose collection utilize aluminum (Aluminum Dhose), all of which contain a superb wide open draw.
This new model of hose has a unique handle that combines aluminum and silicon, creating one hybrid beast of a hose measuring at 197 cm long.

meta.en:
The glass hookah base protector is a durable rubber "sleeve" that fits over the bottom of your glass hookah base. It provides extra cushioning and stability on hard surfaces and prevents the hookah base from slipping or tipping over easily.

Large hookah base protectors measure about 20 cm in diameter but are also very stretchy and will fit over hookah bases with a bottom measuring up to 23 inches in diameter.

Colour: Black, Red, Blue, White (Transparent), Brown

This is used to handle hot coals. These decorative tongs are sure to compliment any of your session. It is 22 cm long and 2 cm width. These tongs are cut from a thicker metal making stronger and harder to bend.
The point on the end of the tong is perfect for breaking and cutting through coals.

Colour: Silver & Gold

meta.en: Silicone Grommet Set is made of silicone, thicker than a regular rubber grommet. It is stretchhable & flexible. This can fit any hookah vase glasses. No more Broken Grommet and No more low quality rubber on your hookah.

description.en: Silicone Grommet Set is made of silicone, thicker than a regular rubber grommet. It is stretchhable & flexible. This can fit any hookah vase glasses. No more Broken Grommet and No more low quality rubber on your hookah.

meta.en:
Hookah Crown is the only way to smoke a long lasting flavorful hookah without any harshness. It’s inverted design allows the tobacco to be slowly vaporized rather then burning quickly with direct coal contact. This ensures a more flavorful session and will last longer than with traditional foil.

Machined in the United States from highest quality stainless steel, the crowns patent-pending design smokes the competition while maintaining a retail price similar to its competitors. As the coal begins to die during a session you simply rotate the handle adjusting the height, allowing more heat with the same amount of coal. 

 
This is an all in one system, no more clay bowls that break, this bowl is indestructible. Users rave that this will be the last hookah bowl you will ever need to buy.
 
The Crown will not only give you a more consistent, smooth hookah every time, it will extend your coal life by more than twice as long!
All in one heat management system:
Coal lasts twice as long!
Tobacco flavor lasts 1 hour longer!
No foil
No poking holes
Indirect heat allows for a smooth smoke every time
Healthier hookah with less COO intake tobacco
Rust resistant

As the coal begins to die during a session you simply rotate the handle adjusting the height, allowing more heat with the same amount of coal.

meta.en: These cleaning brushes are specially designed to clean hookah stems and get into hard-to-reach areas. It is very thick brush part and comfortable handle. We recommend regular cleaning of your hookah to ensure a pleasant and enjoyable smoke. Made for use on hookahs over 60cm tall.

description.en: These cleaning brushes are specially designed to clean hookah stems and get into hard-to-reach areas. It is very thick brush part and comfortable handle. We recommend regular cleaning of your hookah to ensure a pleasant and enjoyable smoke. Made for use on hookahs over 60cm tall.

meta.en: Cleaning Brushes rid the Hookah of ash, or any Flavored Tobacco residue that may be lingering inside your Hookah Stem and Base.

description.en: Cleaning Brushes rid the Hookah of ash, or any Flavored Tobacco residue that may be lingering inside your Hookah Stem and Base.

meta.en:
True Cloudz is not just a simple alternative to shisha tobacco. You can use the Hookah Creme in many creative ways. Use it pure or tune up your tobacco and enjoy incredible huge and heavy clouds. True Cloudz is 100% free of tobacco. The nice clouds are based on a pure vaporising effect of the juice and flavors. No burning, just pure steaming.

Enjoy True Cloudz // Pure Shisha Vape.

HOW TO USE

The hookah creme should be mixed well before use. A Phunel tobacco head is best suited for this product. Spread approx. 5-10g evenly into the tobacco head. As usual, cover the hookah bowl with tin foil and use the heat of an electronic charcoal. Start smoking the hookah slowly like regular hookah tobacco. The hookah creme provides 35-60min of smoking and taste experience depending on the filling quantity

description.en:
True Cloudz is not just a simple alternative to shisha tobacco. You can use the Hookah Creme in many creative ways. Use it pure or tune up your tobacco and enjoy incredible huge and heavy clouds. Enjoy True Cloudz // Pure Shisha Vape.

HOW TO USE

The hookah creme should be mixed well before use. A Phunel tobacco head is best suited for this product. Spread approx. 5-10g evenly into the tobacco head. As usual, cover the hookah bowl with tin foil and use the heat of an electronic charcoal. Start smoking the hookah slowly like regular hookah tobacco. The hookah creme provides 35-60min of smoking and taste experience depending on the filling quantity

meta.en: In the name of Guava is surely identical with Guava Fruit. Sweet, Fruity, and Fresh also tart Guava are prominent in this flavour. Very Unique and yet tingling your taste-buds

description.en: In the name of Guava is surely identical with Guava Fruit. Sweet, Fruity, and Fresh also tart Guava are prominent in this flavour. Very Unique and yet tingling your taste-buds

meta.en: Who doesn't like Vanilla? This one is a vanilla blast with a touch of spiciness. True Cloudz has created Orient Express with an extra flavour of Cream. If you are a fan of creamy and sweet yet adding extra spicy, this one is great pick for you.

description.en: Who doesn't like Vanilla? This one is a vanilla blast with a touch of spiciness. True Cloudz has created Orient Express with an extra flavour of Cream. If you are a fan of creamy and sweet yet adding extra spicy, this one is great pick for you.

meta.en: Sweet and Fruity blueberry and the best part is, this sis combined with Fresh Lemonade. Sweety and citrusy!

description.en: Sweet and Fruity blueberry and the best part is, this sis combined with Fresh Lemonade. Sweety and citrusy!

meta.en: The first thought about Margarita is a cocktail. Yes, the flavour of lime is riding the bus. So refreshing and tangy. Perfect for hot sunny day!

description.en: The first thought about Margarita is a cocktail. Yes, the flavour of lime is riding the bus. So refreshing and tangy. Perfect for hot sunny day!

meta.en: The hint of cigar taste was rounded off with a sweet, yet slightly a taste of vanilla.

description.en: The hint of cigar taste was rounded off with a sweet, yet slightly a taste of vanilla.

meta.en: Orange Vanilla flavour can be easily found on assorted cake or sandwich biscuit. It is so delicious. The name speaks itself orange + vanilla, perfectly combined to become fruity and creamy vanilla flavour profile.

description.en: Orange Vanilla flavour can be easily found on assorted cake or sandwich biscuit. It is so delicious. The name speaks itself orange + vanilla, perfectly combined to become fruity and creamy vanilla flavour profile.

meta.en: You will notice that lime flavour steering the wheel with some light undertones of berries and refreshing ice effect. The cooling sensation provides the flavour to back off overly sweetness. Feel and take a puff as you were in the beach! So fresh and relaxing.

description.en: You will notice that lime flavour steering the wheel with some light undertones of berries and refreshing ice effect. The cooling sensation provides the flavour to back off overly sweetness. Feel and take a puff as you were in the beach! So fresh and relaxing.

meta.en: Yes, peanut butter! This will give you a sensation of pecan nut and perfectly combined with sweet milk. So buttery and milky as if you would want to eat it ! Imagine how delicious it is!

description.en: Yes, peanut butter! This will give you a sensation of pecan nut and perfectly combined with sweet milk. So buttery and milky as if you would want to eat it ! Imagine how delicious it is!

meta.en: Have you ever drunk an Iced Tea infused with peach? Do you want to enjoy it on your shisha? Wait no longer! This peach iced tea flavour from True Cloudz is unbelievably good with an equal tasty as you take a sip of a great peach iced tea. Sweet and very fruity!

description.en: Have you ever drunk an Iced Tea infused with peach? Do you want to enjoy it on your shisha? Wait no longer! This peach iced tea flavour from True Cloudz is unbelievably good with an equal tasty as you take a sip of a great peach iced tea. Sweet and very fruity!

meta.en: Lemon is dominant in this flavour and adding mint to the mix makes it even greater. Citrus lovers must get this flavour!

description.en: Lemon is dominant in this flavour and adding mint to the mix makes it even greater. Citrus lovers must get this flavour!

meta.en: Berries madness! Authentic mix of wild berries, sweet and fruity! Welcome to wilderness of berries world.

description.en: Berries madness! Authentic mix of wild berries, sweet and fruity! Welcome to wilderness of berries world.

meta.en: This flavour is a great marriage vanilla cream & passion fruit. The best to describe it is identical to Maracuja fruit or to be simple is Orange Sugus Candy flavour!

description.en: This flavour is a great marriage vanilla cream & passion fruit. The best to describe it is identical to Maracuja fruit or to be simple is Orange Sugus Candy flavour!

meta.en: Sensation of Bold raspberry flavour and directly hit on your face! Sour and sweet flavour taste. Great flavour, huge massive cloud, long lasting hookah session for sure!

description.en: Sensation of Bold raspberry flavour and directly hit on your face! Sour and sweet flavour taste. Great flavour, huge massive cloud, long lasting hookah session for sure!

meta.en: Feel the sweetness and sourness augmented with some coolness in perfect marriage of this Ice Raspberry. Enjoy your session under hot sunny days balanced with icy raspberry.

description.en: Feel the sweetness and sourness augmented with some coolness in perfect marriage of this Ice Raspberry. Enjoy your session under hot sunny days balanced with icy raspberry.

meta.en:
This flavour from True Cloudz carries a new name and we have been dying to get our hands on. The moment you open the cap, you will be overwhelmed with delicious scent of grapefruit. Infused it with lemonade makes it even tastier and fresher. Expect sweet taste undertones, huge clouds and long lasting flavour for all true cloudz. Go big! Be Bold!

Recommended Mixes:
Citrus flavours play well with this flavour.

description.en:
This flavour from True Cloudz carries a new name and we have been dying to get our hands on. The moment you open the cap, you will be overwhelmed with delicious scent of grapefruit. Infused it with lemonade makes it even tastier and fresher. Expect sweet taste undertones, huge clouds and long lasting flavour for all true cloudz. Go big! Be Bold!

Recommended Mixes:
Citrus flavours play well with this flavour.

meta.en: The blueberry flavour will be noticeable by the time opening the cap. What makes it really great is that this American blueberry flavour has been infused with some cooling effects. The icy sensation kicks back the sweetness and makes it even more fruity! Blueberry lovers must get this flavour !

description.en: The blueberry flavour will be noticeable by the time opening the cap. What makes it really great is that this American blueberry flavour has been infused with some cooling effects. The icy sensation kicks back the sweetness and makes it even more fruity! Blueberry lovers must get this flavour !

meta.en: This is one of the newest member of True Cloudz flavours. Acai berry is so fresh and makes you even more relax every time you take a puff! As it goes along the session, you surely taste the sweetness and creaminess! Unique and enjoyable flavour !

description.en: This is one of the newest member of True Cloudz flavours. Acai berry is so fresh and makes you even more relax every time you take a puff! As it goes along the session, you surely taste the sweetness and creaminess! Unique and enjoyable flavour !

meta.en: EMP stands for Electro Magnetic Pulse but this is not a machine or taste like so at all, this flavour will instead give you sweet and creamy blend of lime and passion fruit. Lime has been magnetized by passion fruit to produce a great combo !

description.en: EMP stands for Electro Magnetic Pulse but this is not a machine or taste like so at all, this flavour will instead give you sweet and creamy blend of lime and passion fruit. Lime has been magnetized by passion fruit to produce a great combo !

Al Fakher shisha tobacco is made in the United Arab Emirates and is one of the more well known brands of tobacco in the Middle East.This high-grade tobacco has a consistent flavor and is well known for the smoothness of its smoke. This kilogram tub will make up to 30-45 hookah bowls, depending on the size of your bowl.

Grape

description.en:
Al Fakher shisha tobacco is made in the United Arab Emirates and is one of the more well known brands of tobacco in the Middle East. This high-grade tobacco has a consistent flavor and is famous for its smooth smoke and affordable price. This 50g box is a great way to sample different flavors!

meta.en:
With over 25 years of experience, the pioneers of the U.S.A flavored hookah tobacco industry have created the ultimate hookah tobacco… Haze TobaccoTM. Our hand crafted premium blends are flavored to an unparalleled perfection. Finally, the social hookah experience is now complete with Haze Tobacco.

Haze TobaccoTM was created by an elite collective of accomplished enthusiasts. We have enlisted the finest individuals to make your Hookah experience unforgettable.

Each flavor is carefully manufactured to excellence. With our patented ‘Stack N Haze’ containers we eliminate the hassles of storage. This allows you to always store your favorite combinations together.

We use the world’s finest combination of ingredients to create unique flavors. With our grand selection of wonderful flavors, you will want to try them all. We are based in Texas, so we do things… BIG. BIG on flavor, BIG white clouds of smoke, and BIG on satisfaction…. That’s Haze TobaccoTM. Our flavors will revolutionize this tradition putting Haze Tobacco into a new class.

Haze Tobacco TM is for those who expect nothing but…. Simply the BestTM
